tag.description: Renders a table based on p:dataTable with PagedDataModel. Each item is available by #{item}.

attribute.description: The id of the p:dataTable. Will also be used as widgetVar name.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Data model must be an instance of PagedDataModel.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: The style class of the p:dataTable. Defaults to null.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Whether the table is rendered. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Whether to update the query string on every paging, sorting, filtering, searching and selection action. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: updateQueryString

attribute.description: The unique prefix of the query string parameter name in case you're having multiple tables in the same page while having updateQueryString. Defaults to empty string.
attribute.name: queryParameterPrefix

attribute.description: Whether the table is sortable. Defaults to true. This can be overriden on a per-column basis when same attribute is also set in op:column.
attribute.name: sortable

attribute.description: Whether the table is filterable. Defaults to true. This can be overriden on a per-column basis when same attribute is also set in op:column.
attribute.name: filterable

attribute.description: Whether the table is paginable. Defaults to true. This will show a paginator in bottom of table.
attribute.name: paginable

attribute.description: Number of rows to display per page. Defaults to 10.
attribute.name: rows

attribute.description: Options to show in rows per page dropdown of p:dataTable paginator template. Defaults to 10,25,50
attribute.name: rowsPerPage

attribute.description: The p:dataTable paginator template. Defaults to {CurrentPageReport} {FirstPageLink} {PreviousPageLink} {PageLinks} {NextPageLink} {LastPageLink}
attribute.name: paginatorTemplate

attribute.description: Text to display before the {CurrentPageReport} template. Defaults to "Showing".
attribute.name: currentPageReportPrefix

attribute.description: The {CurrentPageReport} template. Defaults to {startRecord} - {endRecord} of {totalRecords}
attribute.name: currentPageReportTemplate

attribute.description: Text to display after the {CurrentPageReport} template. Defaults to "records"
attribute.name: currentPageReportSuffix

attribute.description: Whether the table is searchable. Defaults to false. This will show a global filter input field in top of table.
attribute.name: searchable

attribute.description: The placeholder of the global search field. Defaults to "Searchâ€¦".
attribute.name: searchPlaceholder

attribute.description: The label of the global search button. Defaults to "Search".
attribute.name: searchButtonLabel

attribute.description: Whether the table is exportable. Defaults to false. This will show a column toggler and export button in top of table.
attribute.name: exportable

attribute.description: The label of the column toggler button. Defaults to "Columns".
attribute.name: columnTogglerButtonLabel

attribute.description: The export file type. Defaults to "csv". This delegates to p:dataExporter type.
attribute.name: exportType

attribute.description: The label of the export button. Defaults to "CSV".
attribute.name: exportButtonLabel

attribute.description: The label of the export visible columns button. Defaults to "Visible Columns".
attribute.name: exportVisibleColumnsButtonLabel

attribute.description: The label of the export all columns button. Defaults to "All Columns".
attribute.name: exportAllColumnsButtonLabel

attribute.description: The file name format of the exported file. Defaults to #{id}-#{of:formatDate(now, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss')}.
attribute.name: exportFilename

attribute.description: Method to pre-process the exported document.
attribute.name: exportPreProcessor

attribute.description: Method to post-process the exported document.
attribute.name: exportPostProcessor

attribute.description: Whether you want to show the contents of <ui:define name="actions"> in top of table. Defaults to searchable or exportable.
attribute.name: actionable

attribute.description: Whether the table is selectable. Defaults to false.
attribute.name: selectable

tag.description: Renders a column based on p:column for op:dataTable. Each item is available by #{item}.

attribute.description: The field (property) name of the #{item} representing the column value. By default, this is used in id, field, headerText, value and filterBy attributes of p:column.
attribute.name: field

attribute.description: The column ID. Defaults to field.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: The column header text. Defaults to field.
attribute.name: head

attribute.description: The column value. Defaults to #{item[field]}.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: The column cell tooltip. Defaults to nothing.
attribute.name: tooltip

attribute.description: The style class of the p:column. Defaults to null.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Whether the column is rendered. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Whether the column is by default visible when using column toggler. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: visible

attribute.description: The width of the p:column. Defaults to null.
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Whether the value is iterable. This will trigger the value to be rendered in an ui:repeat with linebreaks. Defaults to whether the field property is an instance of Iterable.
attribute.name: iterable

attribute.description: Whether the column is sortable. Defaults to sortable attribute of parent op:dataTable.
attribute.name: sortable

attribute.description: Whether to sort column descending on first click. Defaults to false. This attribute is ignored when sortable=false.
attribute.name: sortDescending

attribute.description: Whether the column is filterable. Defaults to filterable attribute of parent op:dataTable.
attribute.name: filterable

attribute.description: The filter mode of the field. Supported values are "contains", "startsWith", "endsWith" and "exact". Defaults to "contains" when filterOptions=null, else "exact". Any unsupported value is interpreted as "exact". This attribute is ignored when filterable=false.
attribute.name: filterMode

attribute.description: The filter options of the field. Supported values are Object[], Collection and Map. This attribute is ignored when filterable=false.
attribute.name: filterOptions

attribute.description: Whether the column is exportable. Defaults to true.
attribute.name: exportable

attribute.description: The export value. Defaults to #{value}.
attribute.name: exportValue
